titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/26/1994--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the requirement that States pay unemployment compensation on the basis of services performed by election workers if remuneration for a calendar year is expected to be less than $200.
